title: Miso-Ginger Dressing
directions: Combine the miso and vinegar (or vinegar and lime juice) in a small bowl and whisk together. Add the remaining ingredients and whisk until amalgamated. You can also mix this in a blender.
Toss with the salad of your choice.
ingredients: rounded tablespoon white or yellow miso
tablespoons seasoned rice vinegar, or 1 tablespoon rice vinegar and 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice
small garlic clove; pressed, minced or put through a press
tablespoons peanut oil or grapeseed oil
